m_szDocTitle: Palladium and platinum to fall short of highs this year — FT.com
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- by: Henry Sanderson Prices of precious metals platinum and palladium are likely to peak this year, as the market lacks the support that gold draws from investors, a survey said on Monday at the start of London’s annual platinum week.
